Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: do not move all UTXOs of both wallets until you have let the moved UTXOs mature, otherwise everything will stop until they mature (no matter how you split them)

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: in a 100% PoS, invalids can also come from valid blocks that are not valid because of time

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: basically, PoS builds a block now and waits to see if it's still valid when it's allowed (by time) to be a valid block (it's a bit more complex than that, but trying to keep it simple)
